author: dibesfer
long_description:
# Welcome to Colorlandia 

The game behind **¬°Colorlandia!** server

üåàRainbow inspired ü™∂ light-weight creative exploration game to build whatever you imagine with voxels. Fun, childish and inspiring! üñåÔ∏è

- 7 colored grass-like biomes, plus black, gray and white make 10 new biomes on the surface. 
- Plus 3 underground biomes plenty of unique ores. (gray, dark gray and black)
- Furniture, trees, flowers, stars and butterflies.  
- 7 colored data-like biomes plus white.

ü™ê Make a total of 21 different and colorful biomes.

This game consists of mainly 2 major mods I'm uploading separately to CDB

- Colorlandia
- [Datatest](https://content.luanti.org/packages/dibesfer/datatest/)

Join the [community at discord](https://discord.gg/tUHBS9eERn)

by [**dibesfer**.com](https://dibesfer.com)
